EmailTemplate.name: 08-11-21 HOS Support Monthly Call for Wendy's Reminder.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder – Don’t forget to attend tomorrow’s roundtable discussion
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Learn about recent updates and metrics from the NCR Help Desk that supports your restaurants. The Roundtable is a monthly call where NCR Representatives share information about recent updates and help desk metrics from the previous month and take questions from you, our iNCRedible customers, about support services for your account. This month we will have a special guest, Sesha Madapoosi, GM of NCR Restaurant as a Service group. Join your NCR team, this Thursday, August 12, 2021 at 1:30 PM ET for an update. Agenda - 1:30 PM to 1:50 PM Updates and Help Desk Metrics - 1:50 PM Q & A (Please submit your questions in advance to trenise.brunson@ncr.com) We look forward to sharing our updates with you on Thursday. Select the button below to add this event to your calendar today! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
